createRules(String) - Method in class iitb.cfilt.cpost.stemmer.StemmerRuleReader
This is a 'reader' function which reads opens the given file for reading and calls the hashIt(String line, String filename) function to hash the lines which are not 'comment-lines' and which are not 'empty-lines.'
